extendedInfo.description: GovEnergy celebrates its 14th year as the premier energy training workshop and trade show. The GovEnergy workshop and trade show serves to provide effective energy management training to federal employees and their associated stakeholders. In doing so, it fosters opportunities to further educate and encourage the best application of practices, products, and services as they relate to energy efficiency, renewable energy, water efficiency, and greenhouse gas management within the federal sector. GovEnergy brings together the nationâs leading experts in policy, technology, and facility operations to address the challenges of federal energy management. GovEnergy delivers thought provoking insight, serving to develop the skills of federal employees and stakeholders working to meet mandated energy goals.
